content.p: A fee of one hundred seventy-five dollars shall accompany each retailer's license application or license renewal application. A separate license is required for each separate location at which the retailer operates.

of this section does not apply to any person applying for a retailer's license or for renewal of a retailer's license if the person has a valid retailer's license under RCW 82.24.510 for the place of business associated with the retailer's license application or renewal application.

A retailer applying for, or renewing, both a retailer's license under RCW 82.26.170 and a vapor products retailer's license under RCW 70.345.020 may pay a combined application fee of two hundred fifty dollars for both licenses. [ 2016 sp.s. c 38 s 28 ; 2005 c 180 s 13 .] NOTES: Contingent effective date — 2016 sp.s. c 38 ss 5-10 and 28: See note following RCW 70.345.020 . Effective date — 2005 c 180: See note following RCW 82.26.105 .
